Hey, it‚Äôs Vinny!

Here‚Äôs the list of all the improvements we introduced in update nr #8:
- 12 new Rent-A-Thug missions
- new NPCs (non-player characters)
- new tenant models
- new voice overs: all characters are now fully voiced
- new talking animations and active eye movement
- new car - Aisan Cougar - to steal and disassembly
- new loot storage devices: car box and Garage locker
- new ability: grab stair rails and small fences to jump over them & move faster!

- interactive newspaper with latest update overview video
- backpack: TOOLS button removed - tools spawn automatically in their minigame areas
- Hungarian language added
- This very update window you're looking at! :)
FIXED:
- tutorial block / hand freeze when trying to get remote into your backpack
- missing house 111 tenant blocking the scan-the-tenant mission progress
- rapid car turning while driving is now compensated
- turning crouch button while playing roomscale causing automatic crouch
- Inconsistent player's height while starting the game (if you still haver problems - reset your Guardian)
- house 110 plates breaking after picking them up
- BlackBay: selling things that aren't in your backpack
- house 113 painting marked incorrectly as QUEST
- disassembling non-QUEST-marked necklace progresses the story
- police car spawning in the air
- occasional bugs with jewelry minigame
**Thanks for playing ‚Äì yours sincerely ‚Äì 3R Games team:)**
